knowledge_base.description: Financial knowledge base containing benchmarks, behavioral finance principles, financial concepts, advice frameworks, and regulatory guidelines

agents.name: The Commander
agents.description: Orchestrates user journey, tracks current screen and progress, maintains user profile (risk tolerance, emotional state, literacy level), decides which specialist to activate, coordinates handoffs, updates Financial Power Level based on all agent inputs

agents.name: Financial Analyst Agent
agents.description: Provides real-time input analysis and financial health assessment - validates income-to-expense ratios, flags risks, calculates opportunity alerts

agents.name: Coach Agent
agents.description: Delivers behavioral nudges, emotional support, and motivation - detects hesitation patterns, celebrates progress, provides reassurance

agents.name: Educator Agent
agents.description: Provides adaptive educational content and jargon-busting - delivers screen-specific mini-lessons, adjusts explanations based on literacy level

agents.name: Advisor Agent
agents.description: Guides conversational decision-making at key points - asks clarifying questions, provides personalized recommendations for SIPs, insurance, and risk allocation
